short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free tool to add custom headers and footers in PDFs. Useful for adding custom copyrights for books and other documents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📄 Add Headers and Footers to PDFs Easily 📄

Transform your PDF documents with our user-friendly Chrome extension that lets you effortlessly add headers and footers to each page. Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone needing to customize PDFs, this tool is designed to streamline your workflow and enhance your documents with personalized headers and footers.

Key Features:

📁 Simple PDF Upload: Click on the extension, upload your PDF using the default file upload option, and get started right away.
✍️ Customizable Headers and Footers: Add text to the header and footer sections of each page in your PDF. Perfect for adding titles, dates, page numbers, and more.
📐 Flexible Alignment Options: Choose from left, center, or right alignment for your headers and footers, with the default setting at the center.
✅ Enable/Disable with Ease: Use checkboxes to easily enable or disable headers and footers as needed.
🔴 Red Color Scheme UI: Enjoy a sleek and visually appealing interface with a red color scheme that makes customization a breeze.

How to Use:

1. 🔍 Install the Extension: Add the extension to your Chrome browser from the Web Store.
2. 📤 Open the Extension: Click on the extension icon to launch the interface.
3. 📂 Upload Your PDF: Use the file upload option to select the PDF you want to customize.
4. 📝 Set Header and Footer: Enter your desired text for the header and footer. Choose the alignment and enable/disable options as needed.
5. 📄 Generate Your PDF: Click the "Add Header/Footer" button to create a new PDF with your customized headers and footers.

Applications:

📚 Academic Papers: Add titles, authors, and page numbers to your research papers and assignments.
💼 Business Documents: Customize reports, proposals, and presentations with company names, logos, and dates.
📖 Personal Use: Personalize eBooks, letters, and other documents with your name, date, and custom messages.
🗂️ Legal Documents: Ensure consistency and professionalism in contracts, agreements, and other legal papers.
📊 Marketing Materials: Enhance brochures, flyers, and newsletters with company branding and contact information.
📅 Event Planning: Add event names, dates, and page numbers to programs, schedules, and itineraries.
✏️ Education: Teachers can add headers and footers to worksheets, lesson plans, and exam papers for easy organization and identification.

 Why Choose This Extension?

🤗 User-Friendly: Intuitive design and easy-to-use features make it accessible for all users.
⚡ Efficient: Quickly customize and generate new PDFs without the need for complex software.
🌐 Versatile: Suitable for a wide range of applications, from academic to professional and personal use.
